materials.raw_text:
Cadmium (Cd): 220 g 
 Europium (Er): 60 g 
 Lithium (Li): 10 g 
 Silicon (Si): 10 g

sourcing.instructions:
Cadmium: Obtain from chemical supply companies or metal suppliers with safety certifications. 
 Europium: Available from specialized rare earth metal suppliers or online chemical retailers. 
 Lithium: Purchase from battery component suppliers or chemical distributors. 
 Silicon: Obtain from semiconductor material suppliers or online chemical markets.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure each ingredient accurately using a digital scale.

 3. Add 60 g of Europium to the Cadmium, ensuring an even distribution.
